about_the_game:
Build To Satisfy

Create brilliant musical patterns and chaotic points machines in this unique physics-based idle-progression game. Unlock and deploy dozens of unique bumpers, cannons, flippers, explosives and more that have you scoring exponentially more points with every addition to your simulation.

Simulate To Your Own Style

Design the pinball machine of your dreams with balls flooding everywhere or a precision Rube-Goldberg machine that collects every coin in a stage. As long as the balls keep moving the points (and music) will flow. 

I didn't know you were a chill game like that.

Progress through four stages with unique mechanics and music while unlocking over 250 achievements. Once you've seen the stages, Ascend your progression by spending achievement points to make your next run faster, and making it feasible to hunt the challenge objectives left on each stage.
